thread.title: Chaos on M6 as emergency services tackle large fire
thread.title_full: Chaos on M6 as emergency services tackle large fire | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Chaos on M6 as emergency services tackle large fire
text:
Commuters in Staffordshire are being warned to expect delays on the M6 this afternoon after a lorry burst into flames.
Highways England @HighwaysWMIDS Follow fire service is on route but please be aware of standing traffic and drifting smoke #M6 S/B J16-J15 http://t.co/mjuMcZ7wKP
14:25 - 9 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Three lanes are closed and partially blocked on the southbound carriageway between J16 A500 (Stoke-On-Trent / Crewe) and J15 A500 (Stoke-On-Trent).
Firefighters are at the scene.
Staffordshire Fire @StaffsFire Follow Crews from Sandyford, Newcastle, Kidsgrove, Hanley & The water Carrier from Cheadle are dealing with a large fire on the M6 S 16 - 15.
15:02 - 9 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Wed 9 Sep 2015 Travel M6 motorway Fire
